org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian

Class KnobTrackScrollerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.input.KnobDragScrollerImpl
      • org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.KnobTrackScrollerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Caret, org.jemmy.interfaces.Scroller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScrollBarScroller, SliderScroller

    public class KnobTrackScrollerImpl
extends org.jemmy.input.KnobDragScrollerImpl
    Base class for deriving classes like SliderScroller and ScrollBarScroller. Class adds getter for Shifter interface to track of UI control.
    Author:
    ineverov, shura
